member.name: READYSTATE
member.summary: Note This component is available for use in the Microsoft Windows 2000, Windows XP, and Windows Server 2003 operating systems. It may be altered or unavailable in subsequent versions.The ReadyState property retrieves the ReadyState of the MSWebDVD object.

member.name: READYSTATE.READYSTATE_INTERACTIVE
member.summary: Object is interactive, but not all its data is available.

member.name: READYSTATE.READYSTATE_COMPLETE
member.summary: Object has received all its data.
